Posts.Content: Hi I've just been for my bone scan and the nurse told me it's because of the ANASTROZOLE , apparently it weakens the bone, therefore if the bones were already weak they could prescribe something to help reduce the outcome,she also said I have to go back in three years time for another bone scan, so they can look to see if there is any difference, hope this helps
Posts.Title: bone scan question

Posts.Content: Hi there when I was given ANASTROZOLE my consultant also referred me to have a bone scan, although I've been took of ANASTROZOLE he said to still go ahead and have it done,so as far as I know your oncology doctor should refer you,
Posts.Title: bone scan question

Posts.Content: I've been back to my oncologist to see which tablet I'm to be on for the next five years and apparently they have all the same ingredient so I can't take any, so that's it seems my treatment will be over after I've had another 9 rounds of herceptin, they say there's nothing else I can have, my family are really worried as they knew the ANASTROZOLE would have stopped any oestrogen or eastrogeon doing what it shouldn't be doing,they now think the cancer will return, how can I reasure them it won't,
Posts.Title: Allergic reaction to anastrozole

Posts.Content: Thanks  dreamthief, THANKYOU for explaining it that way, yes I'm post meno, they did check that before i went on ANASTROZOLE ive already looked into foods such as tumeric, garlic, and red wine ( bonus) tomatoes and other everyday foods,all should help being there's nothing else for me,and yes we can all hope it DOSENT come back, at least I can explain to my children what you have told me and hopefully they will begin to stop worrying about me, if ever they will,,xx⛄️❄️⛄️❄️⛄️❄️⛄️
Posts.Title: Allergic reaction to anastrozole

Posts.Content: My sister wanted to treat me to a spa day,as I'm going through chemo they say I can't have some of the treatments on offer,one which I was looking forward to was the pig in mud,it consist of scrubbing your body with honey type scrub which melts into your skin, it then gets steamed then washed of in warm water,I have had this treatment prior to chemo and can't understand why I can't have it now,also they say I can't have the head massage,I'm sure there is alternate treatments but can anyone answer why they don't treat chemo patients to certain treatments
Posts.Title: Chemo and spa treatments

Posts.Content: Hi Kate I was in your position a few years ago, had my surgery before Christmas but didn't start my chemo until after the new year, I'd like to think they got all the cancer and chemo rads and her herceptin was all to keep the little brighter away,, so far so good , if you need any advise feel free to ask
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed - any advice please?

Posts.Content: I don't want to seem ungratefull but I've stopped taking my tomoxifen,I know it's supposed to be doing its job but I hated the three weeks I was taking it ,I had so much pain in my joints, fingers and toes and sweat, all night and day, it looked like someone had poured scolding hot water at my face with the hot flushes,I am aiming to go back to work but with all the side effects it made me so tired there's no way I'd be able to work feeling the way I did,since stopping I'm back to normal,I'm still having herceptin every three weeks,surely with everything from surgery,chemo, radiotherapy and herceptin, there's no chance the cancer will come back, surely that one tablet a day that's making me miserable can be a cure,there's no way I want those symptoms for the next five years,who thinks I'm wrong,??
Posts.Title: Giving up Tomoxifen, right to wrong?

Posts.Content: i know they have to advertise to get funding and my family themselves have raised money to support the cause, what they don't seem to understand that every time there's an advert a fundraiser a offer to come and support cancer awareness,,it brings back the horrific time I went through breast cancer and only brings back nightmares, I want to scream and shout just leave me alone I don't want to be reminded about the time I was left in my own mess, when I crawled on my hands and knees because I need to get to bed but didn't have the strength to get there, having to be held up on the toilet while my inside came away, looking in the mirror at the alien staring back at me, not being able to eat because of the ulcers that plagued my mouth, I could go on and on, not it's not funny and Ive swore I will never go through it again, it's not like childbirth you forget that pain, going through cancer, the op chem rads the whole shabang, no that's something you hope will subside but I cry every time I think what I went through, and that's 2 years on, there's a reminder everyday some I can turn away from but if this Stephen could just see that when my hair fell out and my husband with tears in his eyes shaved the last few strands of he wouldn't have been laughing, he would have been more respectful to all of us, for all his laughing I just hope it was worth the money he raised, personally I would give my last penny not to have to go through it again,
Posts.Title: Does anyone else dislike the Macmillan Brave the Shave campaign?

Posts.Content: I was on tomoxifen and I stopped taking it after the horrible side effects,told my consultant and he put me on ANASTROZOLE only after one day I'm sweating my socks off, he said if after about nine days the symptoms are no easier to stop again and make another appointment, my blood test shown I had gone through the change already,there must be something that us poor women can take without going through all the side effects, haven't we dealt with enough already with ops, chemo radiotherapy, herceptin every three weeks,this should be a time of joy but it's never ending,Sorry for moaning but it's just not fair,
Posts.Title: Does anyone else feel low and anxious on Tamoxifen?

Posts.Content: Yes forgot herceptin I have that to for the next year, I was hoping that part was easily to do around work, please let me know any side effects, I also have to have radiology after my chemo, I'm only on mu second cycle of chemo, am I planning to far ahead about getting back into work?i did speak to an adviser at magpies and it was him that told me I wasn't entitled to anything,,
Posts.Title: No financial help!!

Posts.Content: I also have had to take sick leave from my job, I'm 55,I asked for advise on help with finances but was told no not for breast cancer,it's diabolical, they said if I was a single parent I would get everything, apparently pip DOSENT see breast cancer as a long term illness, I agree but when your husbands losing wages for all the appointments and surgery sand chemo, I've had to ask friends to step in so he can go and work for the wages we are losing with me not being in work, it's not right, he is so tired and feels guilty not giving me the time he really wants to,I even got turned down for a parking permit, they said because they give it for three years in advance I wasn't entitled,it seem that your only entitled to anything if you unemployed,or terminally ill , neither which I'd want to be, I didn't ask for this illness, why do we have to be punished and made to go without at a time when after working so hard throughout our lives the system lets you down,to be honest I'll be happy when I'm back at work but this is going to take the best part of a year if not more out my life,why does it cost you to be ill, it's wrong,RANT OVER
Posts.Title: No financial help!!

Posts.Content: I also have had to take sick leave from my job, I'm 55,I asked for advise on help with finances but was told no not for breast cancer,it's diabolical, they said if I was a single parent I would get everything, apparently pip DOSENT see breast cancer as a long term illness, I agree but when your husbands losing wages for all the appointments and surgery sand chemo, I've had to ask friends to step in so he can go and work for the wages we are losing with me not being in work, it's not right, he is so tired and feels guilty not giving me the time he really wants to,I even got turned down for a parking permit, they said because they give it for three years in advance I wasn't entitled,it seem that your only entitled to anything if you unemployed,or terminally ill , neither which I'd want to be, I didn't ask for this illness, why do we have to be punished and made to go without at a time when after working so hard throughout our lives the system lets you down,to be honest I'll be happy when I'm back at work but this is going to take the best part of a year if not more out my life,why does it cost you to be ill, it's wrong,RANT OVER
Posts.Title: No financial help!!

Posts.Content: Yes forgot herceptin I have that to for the next year, I was hoping that part was easily to do around work, please let me know any side effects, I also have to have radiology after my chemo, I'm only on mu second cycle of chemo, am I planning to far ahead about getting back into work?i did speak to an adviser at magpies and it was him that told me I wasn't entitled to anything,,
Posts.Title: No financial help!!

Posts.Content: Hi Maria Lots of good tips, I suffered with mouth problems from thrush to ulcers, first trip was the dentist as she wouldn't touch me during treatment, she said I could get mouth wash on prescription corsodle,as this gets a bit pricey,she prescribed the toothpaste, then I went with a list to my oncol,nystan for thrush, he also gave my a box of vials, you mixed A and b together then swilled your mouth out with them several times a day, worked wonders, like someone said plenty of hand sanitizer don't let anyone pass there germs on your not well enough to fight any infections, well not until the third week, I bought hats wigs the lot ,I only wore them on my good week, it got to where I was thankfully just to go bald, you'll need something though it'll be winter, I went through the summer so with hot sweat and every bug bitting me I had bad reactions to even a gnat bite, my son got me a bug zapper machine, couldn't believe how many bugs got in the house,but it was summer, a nice comfy mattress topper for the hours you will sleep, and for the nights you may be awake, my sister used to massage my hands and feet, paint my nails while I was getting my chemo ,made the time go quick, although they say use black varnish I still lost my nails so any other recommendations worth looking at,I wish I had looked into all this before I started chemo but I was in denial,ridiculous now but not at the time, wishing all the luck for when you start yours,xxxxx
Posts.Title: Preparing for chemo

Posts.Content: Me to rosalyne, I'm in week three and my booby is sore to touch, I thought it was my ribs at first but no it's my boob,it settled after the weekend and didn't hurt as much but after my first day back it is red and sore to touch again,as long as the skin don't break I'm sure it will wear off,I just use cetraben moisturiser , they say there's no need but it DOSENT do any harm either,
Posts.Title: rads and pain!!!

Posts.Content: I told the doc about my sore boob today and she looked to see if it was ok,she seemed happy with it and said it should calm down when rads are finished,she just told me to keep checking and if I notice anything untoward give them a call, even though it's nearly the end of hospital treatment she said there will always be someone to answer any questions, they don't just fob you off, so that's good to hear,
Posts.Title: rads and pain!!!
